trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Ames
There were no other sightings in Ames on or around May 17th 2001
divs: sighting detailson thursday night, may 17, 2001, at 9:45 p.m. (cdt), husband and wife witnessessaw from their second story bedroom backyard deck blinking\strobing\pulsingbright white lights approaching from the west at about 50-55 degrees up from thehorizon. object was last seen at about 30 degrees up from the horizon to theireast, having taken about 3 minutes to traverse that arc of space. as objectdrew near (coming from the west) to about 85 degrees almost overhead, witnessescould see that there were three bright white lights on the underside of thesilent object. acknowledging that the following represents __estimates__ basedon visual perception, rather than cold hard provable facts, following iswitnesses perception of size and distance - closest approach at about 85degrees; no more than 500-750 feet __land distance__ away from witnesses; and analtitude estimate of around 5,000 feet (cloud ceiling was 9,000 feet); with anestimated object size of "bigger than a 747 jetliner." (investigators note: obviously, changing one or more of the above estimate figures could alter anyconclusions that might be drawn, nevertheless, it appears that what was seen wasnot far away, was huge, silent, and moving at fairly slow pace, since it took 3minutes for object to traverse the area from 50-55 degrees up from west horizonto about 30 degrees up from eastern horizon.investigators feel that it is very important to note the following: binocularsused were 8 x 21 bushnells, with a linear diameter view of 378 feet at 1,000yards. linear diameter of the field at 378 feet would indicate an angular fieldof around 7 degrees. both husband and wife tried to view the object through thebinoculars and found that the field of view could not contain the entire object,that is, they could not see the entire object within the field of view affordedby the binoculars. whether the object was closer than estimated, or farther than estimated, couldchange the "hugeness" somewhat, but it would still seem that something verysizeable was seen.during sighting, husband wife dashed from the backyard second story deck to thecircle drive in front of the house, joined by 3 of their children, as theywatched the object move on a straight-line path almost over their house. treesin the surrounding neighborhood finally obscured object from view at about 30degrees up from the horizon.these witnesses are extremely credible people, detail oriented and consciousthat they wanted to pay attention to every detail they could take in. thehusband is a phd at iowa state university. his wife is a professional psychic,who is also very detail oriented - no-nonsense people.
